description:
This additional content includes:

- "Mechanical" face paint

Turn your body into a machine!
Well, maybe not, but you'll kind of look like one with this face paint!

Change up your hunter's look with this special appearance option!

- Face paint can be applied by selecting Change Appearance in the Item Box. It can also be used while creating a character.
- This item changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "Mechanical" face paint
